name: Drone Defense (Koryuto)
description:
Drone defense est un tower defense fps PVPVE. Ce n'est qu'un prototype de fps multijoueur et son développement est suspendu pour le moment.

Drone defense is basically a fps towerdefense with 2 teams facing in PVP . It's only a prototype of multiplayer fps and it's development is currently in standby.

Controls:

move : Z Q S D

Shoot: left mouse
